Julie Ledru stars in the film as Julia, a young woman living in social housing with a difficult relationship with her mother. She loves motocross, so she pretends to buy bikes on shopping websites. That way, she can take them out for test rides and pursue her motocross dreams.

The film is about a wealthy family who lives in isolation in their mansion for months. This is so their community won't find out that Hélène, their daughter, had a one-night stand and got pregnant. After the baby is born, Hélène leaves the house to search for the father, disrupting the family's fragile balance.
